body:
Here the tree command which I have stripped down for readability
```shell
.
├── .git
│   ├── modules
│   │   └── src
│   │       └── package_producer    <-- The .git directory of the submodule
├── .gitmodules
└── src
    ├── package_consumer
    │   └── main.go
    └── package_producer
        ├── .git        <-- FILE !
        └── main.go
```
At this point vendoring through godep into the package consumer will fail
